text:
Frank F. Drowota III (July 7, 1938 – April 15, 2018) was an American lawyer. He served as Chief Justice of the Tennessee Supreme Court twice from 1989 to 1990 and again from 2000 to 2005. He was born in Williamsburg, Kentucky.
Drowota died in Nashville, Tennessee on April 15, 2018 at the age of 79.
